timeline.message: Distinguish images and hadoop images version

Copy configuration files into containers

Copying files into container has some advantages over file system binds.

- it does not require "noop" files
- the destination files are not read-only, they can be further altered

It is not as performant as file system bind though, so it should not be
used for large files like server package.

Allow running product test suites directly

This sourcing configuration optional, suite files can now be invoked
directly.
